description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: The user entwines their body around an anchor point and stretches their arm to lasso distant objects or people. Primarily used for rescue operations.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy wraps himself around the Going Merry's mast and uses his stretching arm to lasso Ryu's raft when the towing ropes break during a storm, pulling the dragon to safety with Zoro's assistance.

description: An anime-only Devil Fruit that gives the user long, sharp nails that can create slicing air blades. The power is based on the kamaitachi (sickle weasel) yokai from Japanese mythology.

users.circumstances: Eric ate the fruit at some point before the Warship Island arc

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can release razor-sharp wind slashes strong enough to cut through rock
strengths.description: The wind slashes created by the user's sharp nails can slice through solid objects at range.

description: An anime-only Devil Fruit that enables the user to telepathically communicate with animals. The name comes from 'hisohiso' meaning 'whisperingly' in Japanese. Notably, this power does not grant control over animals, only communication.

users.circumstances: Apis ate the fruit at some point before the Warship Island arc

weaknesses.weakness: The fruit has virtually no direct offensive uses
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim

strengths.strength: Can communicate telepathically with all animals, including Sea Kings
strengths.description: The user can understand and be understood by animals through telepathy.
